title: Three problematic champs that constantly get tweaked all have something in common...
body:
{{champion:64}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:24}} 

Care to guess what it is?

replies.body: Go look at their patch histories, compare them to someone like {{champion:98}}  or {{champion:4}}  and tell me again about how they're tweaked all the time.

I GOTS EET
lets give Jarvan ward hop too
just cuz that be hilarious
Rito won't remove ward hopping even though it was never intentional. Lee player base especially whines too loudly. Gotta keep it for those LC$ plays.
